column4: I cannot upgrade from 10.04 to 10.10.  I get the following: http://pastebin.com/zE2CtXHn
Maybe a big bug in ubuntu?
did you add a ppa to the repositories, add an unsupported repository or turn off your automatic updates?
nope, fresh install
then that sounds wrong. Try doing: sudo apt-get update - then try upgrading again
nope, same problem.
then please file a bug report as requested
I must say, I'm a little stunned at the supposedly largest Linux distro having such a basic problem as upgrading.  Very, very disappointing.
I agree. I am still using Lucid for that very reason
time to move on I think!
could you please paste the result of: /etc/apt/sources.list
my apologies, that should be: sudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list
V
http://pastebin.com/G7bYkPs1
add this line to the end of that list: deb http://archive.canonical.com/ lucid partner
then do sudo apt-get update again
same problem.  Ubuntu broken
then sorry, but I'm out of ideas. Were I in your shoes I'd forget abt the upgrade and just install 10.10 from CD
nah, move on.....no time for broken distros!
nothing wrong with Lucid
apparently yes
that was tongue in cheek
Oh, sorry about that.
keep asking, soon enough someone who has experienced your prob will be along
